text: @narendramodi Thinktank covid19- sir lockdown was done so that Indian govt gets times to prepare the self in medical, providing ventilators,oxygen, to know covid, it’s spread, and to control,what will be after effect of lockdown and to solve them, but till date we are struggling with the same
